A city hall spokeswoman said: Leo Boland has spearheaded an extremely successful reorganisation of the GLA, implementing significant structural and cultural change to create an efficient and professional organisation. From this position of strength- and in light of proposals in the Localism bill for directly-elected mayors to combine chief executive functions- Mr Boland questioned whether the GLA now requires a high calibre, highly paid chief executive role in addition to a Ken Livingstone . On that basis, he recommended an independent review be carried out to look at this issue. first day senators are allowed to officially submit legislation, David Vitter reintroduced his bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit family planning grants from being awarded to entities that perform abortions. My Title X amendment would end the practice of allowing taxpayer funds to be used to pay for administrative costs and other services offered by abortion providers, a practice that allows other funds to be used for abortion practices, he told LifeNews.com.
